technology: 3nm FinFET (N3P) for XCD, 6nm FinFET (N6) for IOD

die_area.note: 8 XCD accelerator dies + 2 IOD dies + 8 HBM3E stacks

values.condition: target 5% technology process-neutral GPU device-level frequency increase
peak theoretical performance for 16b and 8b formats vs prior generation
peak theoretical performance for FP4 vs FP8 of previous generation
vs prior XCD design for critical workloads
inference performance increase for broad AI use cases

comparison: Over 3x generational inference performance increase with improved energy efficiency compared to MI300X, supporting new FP6/FP4 lower-precision datatypes and increased memory bandwidth/capacity.
quantization: FP6, FP4, FP8, FP16, INT8 support
